quote-1: Think of me; remain cheerful in all your trials and I am with you helping you.
author: -Meher Baba
meher-prem-sammelan-description: Join us as we celebrate 100 years since Meher Baba's momentous first visit to Lucknow with a special two-day Meher Prem Sammelan. Themed Practicality in Spirituality, this event promises a profound journey of love and learning. Our program will feature soul-stirring songs, mesmerizing ghazals, uplifting qawwalis, and inspiring talks by esteemed Meher Baba lovers from around the globe. It's not just an event; it's an opportunity to connect with fellow devotees, deepen our understanding of spirituality, and renew our commitment to Meher Baba's message of love and truth. RSVP now to secure your spot and join us in celebrating Meher Baba's profound legacy and the enduring power of his love.
quote-2: Trust God completely and he will solve all difficulties. Faithfully leave everything to him and he will see to everything.
brochure-1: AMB Lucknow Centre is arranging accommodation for all Baba lovers from 12:00 PM, 21st October to 9:00 AM, 24th October
bullet-points: 21st October 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM (Lunch), 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM (Dinner)
22nd & 23rd October - 7:45 AM to 8:45 AM (Breakfast), 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM (Lunch), 8PM-9PM (Dinner)
brochure-points: Program schedule is available on meherlucknow.org and is displayed at prominent places throughout the venue.
Baba lovers wishing to perform on-stage during open mic can do so between 2:00 PMand 3:30 PM on 22nd & 23rd October.
Request you to kindly return ID strap and plastic cover at the end of the program in spirit of reuse and sustainability.
Transport pickup and drop facility is only available for following accommodation: Aggarwal College, Upkaram Karoti, Sindhu Bhawan, Seven Seas.
Transport pickup facility from accommodation to program venue (Ravindralaya, Charbagh) is being provided by AMB Lucknow Centre from 7:00 AM to 7:30 AM.
Transport pickup facility from program venue (Ravindralaya, Charbagh) to accommodation is being provided by AMB Lucknow Centre from 9:00 PM to 9:30 PM.
Request you to avail photo booth facility at Ravindralaya, Charbagh. Get your pictures clicked on 21st & 22nd October and pictures collected on 22nd & 23rd October.
Kindly maintain strict discipline and sanctity of the program venue and its premises.
Kindly adhere to the rules and regulations of your accommodation premises.
Please take care of your personal belongings.
